attributes.action: Reduce university fees to students for the year 2020-2021 due to COVID
attributes.additional_details:
As students, we have to pay back the loans we have taken out for university. The year of 2020-21 we are paying the full fee for only online teaching during the pandemic. This is affecting all university students to not to achieve their best outcome. 

We need Parliament to come to an agreement to help students to be able to get in with university and get jobs to help pay back loans and their taxes. Help the students help you.
attributes.background: The Government should refund partial tuition fees to UK university students during the online teaching period of 2020-21 due to Covid 19. The online lectures are not equal to face to face lectures. Students are paying full tuition fees for online lectures and are not getting the full uni experience.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
